title: Simone Holtznagel attends the KOOKAI runway show in Sydney
text:
Australian model Simone Holtznagel knows how to show off her best assets.

And on Wednesday, the 26-year-old showcased her hourglass figure and cleavage in a figure-hugging dress at the KOOKAI runway show in Sydney.

She stepped out for the fashion event in a yellow reptile print midi length dress by the Australian label.

Hello, boys! Model Simone Holtznagel, 26, showcased her ample assets low-cut dress in a figure hugging dress at the KOOKAI runway show in Sydney, on Wednesday

Her frock featured a deep-V neckline that drew attention to her cleavage.

The Guess Girl accessorised with a black leather belt around her waist, which accentuated her stunning curves.

Simone added accents of gold to her look with statement earrings, rings and a bracelet, and elevated her the ensemble with a pair of black sandals.

Busty babe: Her frock featured a deep-V neckline that drew attention to her cleavage and she accessorised with a black leather belt around her waist that accentuated her curvy figure

All eyes on her! She styled her blonde locks in a bun, and for makeup opted for a bold eyes, a glowing complexion with subtle pink blushed cheeks

She styled her blonde locks in a bun and for makeup opted for a bold eye, a glowing complexion with subtle pink blushed cheeks.

Her busty appearance at the fashion show comes after she confirmed that she had undergone a cosmetic enhancement last month.

Taking to Instagram, Simone revealed she had had Botox to smooth out a 'rude' line on her forehead at Cosmos Clinic, in Sydney's eastern suburbs.

In pursuit of perfection: Her busty appearance at the fashion show comes after she confirmed that she had undergone Botox to smooth out a 'rude' line on her forehead

She shared a video of herself as she got the procedure done, saying she was 'trying to not be scared.'

'Getting rid of this rude line that has appeared in [the] middle of my bloody forehead,' she captioned the clip, adding a crying with laughter emoji.

The doctor could be heard praising the Bras N Things model on her 'thick skin,' with Simone happily accepting the compliment.
description: Australian model Simone Holtznagel knows how to show off her best assets.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
